reporting-org.narrative: DEPARTMENT FOR BUSINESS, ENERGY AND INDUSTRIAL STRATEGY

title.narrative: Institutional Links April 2016 (ZIKA).Produce relevant applied research to respond to Zika´s social impacts by generating training courses, improved protocols, stronger networks and collaborative platforms for learining and prevention of further impacs. Stiluate the construction of networks across 5 FAPS (research foundations from the states of Pernambuco, Ceará, Distrito Federal, Paraíba e Alagoas) and the Fundaçao Oswaldo Cruz from the Ministry of Health.

description.narrative: Colombia recognises need to improve STEM teaching and learning since primary education to provide a steady supply of talented students equipped with the knowledge, skills and desire to follow a career in STEM areas with robust, up-to-date and relevant curricula. This programme focuses on 3rd to 5th graders.

Grants provide seed-funding to initiate new/develop existing research and innovation partnerships between groups/departments/institutions in partner countries and the UK. Grants are flexible and responsive to in-country needs, allowing partners to establish collaborations on areas linked to country priorities and development needs, and to include relevant non-academic partners (including SMEs/ NGOs).
